items.title: OpenAI valued at $500bn in employee share sale
items.summary: A secondary share sale reportedly values OpenAI at about $500 billion as investors seek exposure to AI infrastructure growth.

items.title: Wafer-scale AI chip company Cerebras drops IPO plans
items.summary: Cerebras will continue raising private capital while demand for AI compute soars across hyperscale data centers.

items.title: Microsoft signs 100MW solar PPA with Shizen in Japan
items.summary: The long-term power purchase agreement will support Microsoftâ€™s decarbonization strategy and new data center capacity in Japan.

items.title: Government shutdown could delay clean-energy guidance, permitting: report
items.summary: A prolonged federal shutdown could slow key IRA clean-energy guidance and add uncertainty to project timelines.

items.title: Is nuclear the key to powering the data center boom?
items.summary: Developers are exploring SMRs and long-term contracts as hyperscalers seek reliable, carbon-free baseload supply.

items.title: Hitachi Energy announces transformer plant expansion in US
items.summary: The investment aims to ease long equipment lead times and support grid modernization projects across North America.

items.title: Siemens Energy to supply HVDC equipment for offshore wind link
items.summary: Project will connect new offshore wind capacity to the mainland grid using next-gen HVDC converter stations.

items.title: GE Vernova wins 400 kV substation contract
items.summary: The turnkey project will add capacity and improve reliability amid rising data-center and industrial loads.

items.title: Utilities flag transformer supply constraints into 2026
items.summary: Long lead times and logistics bottlenecks continue to delay projects; federal incentives aim to increase domestic manufacturing.

items.title: Cable manufacturer adds capacity to meet submarine HV export demand
items.summary: New lines will produce HV subsea cables for offshore wind and interconnectors as global projects accelerate.

items.title: Policy watch: FERC transmission planning rule enters final stretch
items.summary: Stakeholders prepare for compliance with long-term planning requirements meant to unlock regional grid upgrades.

items.title: Renewables update: corporate PPAs hit record volume in Q3
items.summary: Large buyers continue to lock in long-dated renewable contracts amid rising electricity demand from AI and data centers.
